document.full_text: the detroit red wings scored three unanswered third-period goals and had 39 saves from goalie jimmy howard to beat the san jose sharks 4-3 on sunday and keep alive their nhl playoff series.
document.title: wings rally in third to stay alive against the sharks
lines_and_colors: the detroit red wings scored three unanswered third-period goals and had 39 saves from goalie jimmy howard to beat the san jose sharks 4-3 on sunday and keep alive their nhl playoff series.
